responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "60B5B0C84CB4CCE794966BA22245C483", "[Modern Kyronic priests employ a blessed powder derived from the original sands. A portion of this powder was delivered to the purifiers on Verra. The Purging Powder is to be placed in Purification Censers.]")
